attributes.action: Implement a system of direct ballot initiatives (public propositions)
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Government Petitions system has been successful in allowing citizens to voice their concerns and gather support for various causes. However, it lacks a mechanism for direct citizen participation beyond petitioning.

Direct Ballot Initiatives, as seen in other democracies, provide an avenue for citizens to propose, amend, or repeal laws through a direct vote.

Ballot Initiatives empower citizens. They will strengthen our democracy, promote transparency, and ensure that citizens are heard.
attributes.background: Empower citizens to directly influence legislation and policy decisions on issues that resonate with the public by implementing a system of “Direct Ballot Initiatives” alongside general elections. (Constitutional issues and criminal law must be excluded).
